text: The Iuridae are a family of scorpions in the order Scorpiones. Six genera and at least 20 described species are placed in the Iuridae. Anuroctonus pococki ==Genera== * Anuroctonus * Calchas * Hadrurus (giant hairy scorpions) * Iurus * Neocalchas * Protoiurus ==References== ==Further reading== * * * Category:Scorpion families
title: Iuridae
